content: hey friends and fellow dean dears I just ran my own edition of the setting
of the hill giant chief g'wan Montalcino on it was my own interpretation of it I
plugged it into my hoard of the Dragon Queen / Tiamat Adventure and we just had
a lot of fun with it I thought I'd show you some of the shots from the adventure
itself some of the setups they can begin nice to see some of the ways that we set
up the tabletop games for the players to interact with so I'll show you some
shots from the tabletop itself on one side you turn on one side and we let it
and communicate just slowly fighting plenty they're gonna say hey oh yeah hi
strangers there's another year room I don't see how that's even humanly
